message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $1200000 to us. However, considering your appreciation for this item, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $1400000. This is an excellent chance to secure a valuable asset at a price that reflects its true worth while also providing you with significant savings. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
